p: The spectroscopic voxel was positioned according to T 1‐weighted scout images. The frequency was adjusted on the CH 2 signal at 1.3 ppm and the homogeneity of the B 0 field was first improved with automatic B 0 shimming calculated from gradient echo images, then manually adjusted in an interactive mode. The reference voltage for RF pulses was automatically calibrated by the scanner. A frequency offset of –0.3 ppm was used for all measurements.
